headline: Coinbase Stock Falls 33% in Worst Quarter Since FTX Collapse as Crypto Market Declines
summary: Coinbase shares dropped 33% in the first quarter of 2025, making it the company's worst quarter since FTX collapsed in 2022.

headline: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong Challenges 'Outdated' Stablecoin Regulations, Pushes for On-Chain Interest for Users
summary: Brian Armstrong, CEO of Coinbase, has called on U.S. lawmakers to revise proposed stablecoin legislation to allow consumers to earn interest on their holdings.
